clues.text: The 1st edition of her novel "Pride and Prejudice" was simply credited to "The Author of 'Sense and Sensibility'"

rounds.category: YOU SHOULD BE IN AN OPERA!

clues.text: Good news: your agent booked you for the opera "Hansel and Gretel"; bad news: you're playing this villainess
